mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_event(event_code, event_date, event_text, event_user) VALUES (#{event_code}, #{event_date}, #{event_text}, #{event_user})
mapper.update: INSERT INTO tbl_event(event_code,event_date, event_text, event_user) VALUES (#{event_code},#{event_date}, #{event_text}, #{event_user}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE event_date = #{event_date}, event_text = #{event_text}, event_user = #{event_user}
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_event( event_code BIGINT NOT NULL, event_date VARCHAR(30) NULL, event_user VARCHAR(20) NULL, event_text VARCHAR(200) NULL )
